titles.title: To designate the diplomacy center of the Department of State as the Colin Powell Center for American Diplomacy and to provide for appropriate museum visitor and educational outreach services at the center.

To designate the diplomacy center of the Department of State as the Colin Powell Center for American Diplomacy and to provide for appropriate museum visitor and educational outreach services at the center.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to designate the diplomacy center of the Department of State, located in the Harry S Truman building, as the Colin Powell Center for American Diplomacy.
